description: Laminate woodwork not only looks stylish, but also offers outstanding reliability. It should be noted that it is also an environmentally friendly solution. The processed wood is carefully selected and well-dried, knot-free, and the glue is water-resistant. The result is a uniform, stiff profile with excellent lift.
aluplatingdesc: Aluminum on the outside does not require maintenance and ensures optimal weather sealing, also offering the designer the opportunity to express himself through unique shapes and colors.
